properties.areaDesc: Dunkirk to Buffalo NY; Ripley to Dunkirk NY
properties.headline: Gale Watch issued January 10 at 4:57AM EST until January 12 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Buffalo NY
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Small Craft Advisory, south winds 15 to 25
knots and waves 3 to 5 feet. For the Gale Watch, southwest
winds to 35 knots and waves 8 to 11 feet possible.

* WHERE...The nearshore waters of Lake Erie from Ripley to
Buffalo.

* WHEN...For the Small Craft Advisory, until 1 PM EST this
afternoon. For the Gale Watch, from late Saturday night
through Sunday afternoon.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds can cause hazardous waves which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should consider altering plans to avoid possible
hazardous conditions.  Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter
course, and/or secure the vessel for severe wind and waves.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... ...GALE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE SATURDAY NIGHT THROUGH SUNDAY AFTERNOON
